overview:
Jaime is an active member of several web based communities oriented to web hosting services and Internet-related technologies.

Jaime has served as moderator in Foros del Web, the biggest Spanish speaking community forum for Internet technologies and web development topics. He also has been moderator at WebHostingTalk, the biggest forum in its category. He is part of the groups of editors for Open Directory Project (dmoz.org), the biggest web links directory edited by humans that you can find in the Internet.

Jaime has worked in managerial positions and as a consultant for a handful of web hosting companies in Colombia, Italy and Spain.

Jaime is founder and administrator of ComunidadHosting, a bulletin board based web hosting community, focused on web hosting industry and Internet technologies, for the spanish speaking Internet world and it is currently the leading site in its category.
